# Load libraries
```{r echo = F}
source("../R_scripts/libraries.R")
```

# Load data
## Sites
```{r}
load("../data/outputs/sites_upperlower.Rda")
```

## Summary stats
```{r}
filenames <- list.files("../data/outputs/summary_stats/", full.names = T)
for(i in 1:length(filenames)){
  load(filenames[i])
}
```

# Visualization
## Time series by pool
```{r}
summary_yearpool %>% ggplot(aes(x = year, y = propwood))+
  geom_point()+
  stat_smooth(method = "loess", col = "red")+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20))+
  facet_wrap(~pool)
     
```
